title: Password reset procedure
content: Ask user to click password reset. If link expired, generate manual reset and confirm identity.

title: VPN troubleshooting
content: Check VPN server status, restart service, verify firewall rules and user credentials.

title: Disk cleanup
content: Rotate logs, remove old backups, increase disk volume or attach more storage.

title: Email not syncing
content: Check IMAP/POP settings, verify server status, re-authenticate the email account.

title: Slow system performance
content: Check CPU and memory usage, close unnecessary apps, update OS and drivers.

title: Application crash
content: Check logs for errors, reinstall application, update dependencies and OS patches.

title: Network connectivity issues
content: Ping gateway, check DNS configuration, restart network services, check cables.

title: Printer offline
content: Verify printer power and network connection, restart printer service, reinstall driver.

title: Unable to login
content: Verify username/password, check account lockout, reset password if required.

title: Software installation error
content: Check system requirements, ensure proper permissions, disable antivirus temporarily.

title: Database connection failure
content: Verify DB credentials, check network connectivity, restart database service.

title: High CPU usage
content: Identify processes consuming CPU, restart services if needed, apply performance tuning.

title: Disk full alerts
content: Remove unnecessary files, archive old data, expand disk capacity or add storage.

title: Server reboot required
content: Check pending updates, notify users, schedule downtime, reboot server safely.

title: Software license expired
content: Check license status, renew license, update application with new license key.
